oya pita palath wala udawiya nam me gana wadiya nodanna kamata kiyana katha walata nam mehe ayata maru kenthiyi.wisheshayenma pathal kamkaruwanta...mokada kiyanawanam mata me mathakadi ahanna labuna ape game sahodarayek kolambaa rate karak gahapu welawaka ehe tawun kollek kiwwalu ane machan aayi me paththe enakota mata manikak aran waren kiyala..balanna ee kathawe theruma.kolambaa rate minissu hithana inne me apita nikanma manik polowen labenawa kiyala.ane nennam mehemath karumayak..me pathal karumanthaye arumaya gana danne ithin pathal kapana udawiyama thama.eeth ithin kolambaa rate udawiya eka athakin hallu wenna oona na.mokada rathnapure unnata thama pathalakwath nodakapu udawiya me paththe inna nisa..
